revised_title: Researches on the Cinchona Alkaloids: Critical Examination of Existing Methods for Discrimination
tldr: The author examines various methods for detecting and discriminating between different cinchona alkaloids, such as quinine, quinidin, and quinicine, and their salts. The study focuses on the optical and chemical properties of these alkaloids and their iodine-sulfate salts, proposing new methods for their detection and analysis.
